ACKNOWLEDGEMENT
This research was partially supported by the Advancing Well-
being Initiative at the MIT Media Lab. We thank Asma Ghan-
deharioun, Weixuan (Vincent) Chen and Sam Spaulding for
comments that greatly improved the manuscript, and 3 "anony-
mous" reviewers for their insights in presenting the research
methodology and results.
